data.text: Today, I'm happy. It's been an emotional start to 2024 for SWYTCHD and I. My last post was fairly recent when I announced that the company was starting its journey to raise another round of capital. First when I left a fantastic career, a great company, brilliant colleagues, and inspiring mentors to start SWYTCHD. Leaving a job, that basically paid what SWYTCHD used to make earlier this year is never easy. Making no monthly income seemed not natural. I drew no pay for over a year.
